content: Is there documentation on the rollup process? I couldn't find anything in the rustc dev book
currently procedures are spread out a bit between forge and the dev-guide, Santiago Pastorino were talking about moving all of them to forge

Has there been any movement on this since then? I'm happy to help. I'm trying my hardest to get into rustc dev (mostly through #t-compiler/performance work). Knowing about rollups doesn't seem 100% necessary to me, but I'm just curious
(I'm happy to help improve things here)
it's mostly been waiting on me to move things :sweat_smile: if you want to help that would awesome
we decided most of the things in the contributing and getting started section should probably be moved
and that the bootstrapping section should be a reference chapter a little later in the guide
I'll take some time to get the rustc guide and forge cloned locally and then we can talk about it
they're pretty small, it's not like rust-lang/rust where just building it is an ordeal
They also discussed the rollup process on t-infra recently. https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/242791-t-infra/topic/Who.20makes.20rollups.3F
